events.name: Tech Square
events.short_description: Talk with product experts, experience innovations in Tech Square. Catch up on new updates from Samsung platforms and OS like SmartThings, Knox and Tizen, Mobile & Screen Experience, Home & Health Experience, Sustainability.

events.name: Creatively designed video editing
events.short_description: A student is sitting at a creatively designed video editing,While pre-production gives you your plan, and production gives you your footage, you really make your movie in post-production editing.      A solid technical background is essential if you want to create a professional product, but these days editors are supported by excellent digital software applications and newer editing techniques like non-linear editing. In this segment, we take a look at the most effective video editing techniques, new options for software editing and when and how to use them. Master these edit types and make your videos more exciting with a style of your own.

events.name: Expo promoting artificial
events.short_description: generate an image for a technology expo promoting artificial intelligence and machine learning. The picture must have vibrant colors and chrome yellow and white theme

events.name: Young students eagerly coding
events.short_description: An inspiring image that encapsulates young students eagerly exploring coding on sleek, modern computers. Visual references to a variety of coding languages, including Scratch or Python, could hint at the diverse coursework such as Pure Python and Mastering Halocode

events.name: Business Workshop
events.short_description: A workshop to show you how to write a Business Plan - focus on why you are writing it, the format/template and key messages in each section to include

events.name: Digital Workshop
events.short_description: Our digital features workshop is a first step to creating a website specification, user stories or a shared place of understanding for your stakeholders.
